bot: Twitch account that serves as botr
channel: Channel where you want your commands to be used
path: Path in which you find settings.txt either with \ or / as separator, eg C:\Users\USER\Documents\Paradox Interactive\Europa Universalis IV
game: Path in which you find eu4.exe either with \ or / as separator, eg C:\Program Files\Steam\Steamapps\Europa Universalis IV1
